This project focuses on building a modern Android application using Kotlin. Key features include:

1. User Authentication simulation with loading progress.
2. Detailed Nutrition and Meal tracking UI.
3. Calorie statistics and visualization.
4. Hydration tracking with goals.
5. Custom Assessment forms for health data.
6. Advanced notification features including scheduled reminders using AlarmManager.
7. Modern UI/UX design following Material Design principles.

The app uses Activities and Explicit Intents for navigation, keeping the architecture simple for beginners while demonstrating core Android concepts like Options Menus, Dialogs, and Pickers.
